2024-11-12 00:00:00.text:
*Nov 12*
• Redesigned the layout for scheduling within the Availability tab on the User Details page. Shared on GitHub: <https://github.com/ohcnetwork/care_fe/pull/9076|pull request #9076>.
• Synced with Anagha on the low-fidelity wireframe for the sign-in flow.
• Reviewed and shared feedback on the Patient Profile Immunisation tab layout design shared by Vivek.
• Continued refining typography variables in the design system.
*Next*
• Sync with Bodhi on priority design requirements based on the roadmap.
• Review EMR Implementation Docs and create a design to-do list.
• Continue updates to the design system.

2024-11-17 00:00:00.text:
*November 13 & 14*
_Was mostly off-screen due to being unwell._
• Made progress on design system tokens for typography, spacing, grid, and layout.
*November 15*
• Had a call with Vivek to discuss UI libraries, Shadcn, and shared links for following the Shadcn style guide until the Care design style guide is complete.
• Discussed the Shadcn design guideline and sign-in flow with Anagha, shared feedback.
• Read the Lab Management Module documentation and began work on its wireframe.
• Synced with Aravind and updated the GDC landing page.
*Next*
• Continue work on wireframe design for the Lab Management Module UI.
• Sync with Khavin Shankar on the Lab Management Module design.

• Shared feedback to Anagha and Vivek on their work for the Login flow and patient profile pages.

*Next*
• Finalise and share the first version of the Lab module UI.

2024-11-26 00:00:00.text:
*Nov 25*
• Reworked on the Lab Module UI after identifying that collected samples can only be tracked using a barcode scan or barcode number. Updated the Lab Technician’s UI flow accordingly.
• Had a brief discussion with Bodhi and Gigin about the Lab Module progress during a quick call.
• Reviewed Vivek’s designs for the new Shift Patient and Patient Notes pages and provided detailed feedback.
*Next*
• Finalise the Lab Module UI draft and share the updated version.

2024-12-02 00:00:00.text:
*Nov 29*
• Worked on the lab module process page UI. Explored lab process videos to understand the complete workflow and updated the UI based on insights, particularly regarding aliquot creation and barcode assignment.
• Multiple calls with Yashwanth regarding the Lab module UI and filter UX.
• Synced with Vivek on the Facility settings page UI.
*Over the weekend*
• Created multiple iterations of the lab module, spending time understanding the lab process flow and revising several screens. <https://www.figma.com/design/Z93EYKSa1MdBmXndsMBJSQ/Care?node-id=2868-1257|Figma link>
*Next*
• Review the patient profile tab pages designed by Vivek.
• Sync with Bodhi on the Lab module UI.
• Complete the UI for pathologist/doctors review of Lab results.
